text: Juan Carlos Tabío (1943 – 18 January 2021) was a Cuban movie director and screenwriter. He was best known for his 1994 movie Strawberry and Chocolate which won awards at the 44th Berlin International Film Festival, and was also nominated for the Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film. He also directed the 2000 movie Lista de Espera. Tabío died on 18 January 2021 at the age of 77.Fallece en Cuba Juan Carlos Tabío, codirector de "Fresa y Chocolate" ==References== ==Other websites== * * Havana Cultura Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cuban screenwriters Category:Movie directors
title: Juan Carlos Tabío
